SELECT /*EBBFrontEpisdMapper.selectFrontCouseList*/ a. edctn_seq , episd_year , episd_ord , episd_seq , (select parnt_seq from co_code_mst WHERE cd = a.ctgry_cd) as parnt_seq , (SELECT cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE lft_val <= (SELECT lft_val FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = a.ctgry_cd) AND rht_val >= (SELECT rht_val FROM co_code_mst WHERE cd = a.ctgry_cd) AND dpth = 2) prnt_cd_nm , a.ctgry_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst WHERE cd = a.ctgry_cd) as ctgry_cd_nm , a.nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_mthd_cd) as stduy_mthd_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_dd_cd) as stduy_dd_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_time_cd) as stduy_time_cd_nm , accs_strt_dtm , accs_end_dtm , DATEDIFF(accs_end_dtm, NOW()) AS accs_order_day , edctn_strt_dtm , edctn_end_dtm , accs_status_nm , accs_status_order , fxnum_cnt , fxnum_impsb_yn , rcrmt_mthd_cd , rcrmt_mthd_cd_nm , place_seq , (SELECT web_path FROM co_file_dtl WHERE file_seq = a.thnl_file_seq AND file_ord = 0) AS web_path , place_nm FROM ed_edctn_prcs_mst a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
bbb.* , (SELECT NM FROM ed_edctn_place_mst WHERE PLACE_SEQ = bbb.place_seq) as place_nm
FROM (SELECT edctn_seq , episd_year , episd_ord , episd_seq , accs_strt_dtm , accs_end_dtm , edctn_strt_dtm , edctn_end_dtm , fxnum_cnt , fxnum_impsb_yn , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '접수대기' when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '접수중' when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '접수마감' END AS accs_status_nm , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '2' /*접수대기*/ when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '1' /*접수중*/ when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '3' /*접수마감*/ END AS accs_status_order , place_seq , rcrmt_mthd_cd , rcrmt_mthd_cd_nm , @rownum:=@rownum+1 FROM (select b.edctn_seq , b.episd_year , b.episd_ord , b.episd_seq , b.accs_strt_dtm , b.accs_end_dtm , b.edctn_strt_dtm , b.edctn_end_dtm , (SELECT count(mem_seq) FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst WHERE edctn_seq = b.edctn_seq AND episd_year = b.episd_year AND episd_ord = b.episd_ord AND stts_cd = 'EDU_STTS_CD01') AS accs_cnt , b.fxnum_cnt , b.fxnum_impsb_yn , place_seq , b.rcrmt_mthd_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=b.rcrmt_mthd_cd) as rcrmt_mthd_cd_nm from ed_edctn_episd_mst b ) bb, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP
ORDER BY accs_status_order asc, accs_strt_dtm ASC) bbb GROUP BY edctn_seq
) bb ON a.edctn_seq = bb.edctn_seq
ORDER BY accs_status_order ASC, accs_order_day asc
ORDER BY edctn_strt_dtm asc
ORDER BY stduy_dd_cd_nm asc
ORDER BY stduy_dd_cd_nm desc
ORDER BY accs_status_order ASC, accs_order_day asc
limit #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /*EBBFrontEpisdMapper.selectFrontCouseListCnt*/ count(*) FROM ed_edctn_prcs_mst a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
bbb.*
FROM (SELECT edctn_seq , episd_year , episd_ord , episd_seq , accs_strt_dtm , accs_end_dtm , edctn_strt_dtm , edctn_end_dtm , fxnum_cnt , fxnum_impsb_yn , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '접수대기' when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '접수중' when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '접수마감' END AS accs_status_nm , case when NOW() < accs_strt_dtm then '2' when NOW() > accs_strt_dtm AND NOW() < accs_end_dtm then '1' when NOW() > accs_end_dtm OR (fxnum_impsb_yn = 'N' AND accs_cnt >= fxnum_cnt) then '3' END AS accs_status_order , place_seq , place_nm , web_path , @rownum:=@rownum+1 FROM (select b.edctn_seq , b.episd_year , b.episd_ord , b.episd_seq , b.accs_strt_dtm , b.accs_end_dtm , b.edctn_strt_dtm , b.edctn_end_dtm , (SELECT count(mem_seq) FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst WHERE edctn_seq = b.edctn_seq AND episd_year = b.episd_year AND episd_ord = b.episd_ord AND stts_cd = 'EDU_STTS_CD01') AS accs_cnt , b.fxnum_cnt , b.fxnum_impsb_yn , place_seq , (SELECT NM FROM ed_edctn_place_mst WHERE PLACE_SEQ = b.place_seq) as place_nm , (SELECT web_path FROM co_file_dtl WHERE file_seq = 1 AND file_ord = 0) AS web_path from ed_edctn_episd_mst b ) bb, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP
ORDER BY accs_status_order asc, accs_strt_dtm ASC) bbb GROUP BY edctn_seq ) bb ON a.edctn_seq = bb.edctn_seq

SELECT /* EBBFrontEpisdMapper.selectCouseTrgtList */ a.cd_id , a.cd as prnt_target_cd , a.cd_nm as prnt_target_cd_nm , ifnull(case when a.cd = b.target_cd then b.target_nm end, '없음') as target_cd_nm from co_code_mst a LEFT JOIN( SELECT edctn_seq , CD , LEFT(CD, 11) AS target_cd , GROUP_CONCAT((select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.cd) SEPARATOR ', ') AS target_nm FROM ed_edctn_trgt_dtl a WHERE edctn_seq = #{detailsKey} GROUP BY target_cd ) B ON A.CD = LEFT(B.CD, 11) AND edctn_seq = #{detailsKey} WHERE 1=1 AND A.CD_ID = 'ED_TARGET' AND A.DPTH = 2
